name: Die by the Sword: Limb from Limb
name_original: Die by the Sword: Limb from Limb
description:
Die by the Sword: Limb from Limb is an action game developed by Treyarch Invention. It came out on 30-09-1998. Interplay Productions published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Die by the Sword: Limb from Limb on PC.
